title: Sensational news! 爆炸性新闻！
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question.What did he say? What did he tell you?
听录音，然后回答问题。他说了什么？他告诉了你什么？

text_and_translation.text: They told me (that) they wanted their dinner.
text_and_translation.translation: 他们告诉我他们想要晚餐。
我已完成了我的家庭作业。

text_and_translation.text: He said (that)he had finished his homework.
text_and_translation.translation: 他说他已完成了他的家庭作业。

text_and_translation.text: He told me (that)he had finished his homework.
text_and_translation.translation: 他告诉我他已完成了他的家庭作业。

notes.title: Sensational news
notes.describe: 这个短语用于描述非常令人惊讶或引起广泛关注的新闻。在课文中，这可能意味着某个事件或情况引起了公众的极大兴趣。

vocabulary.definition: 告诉(tell的过去式和过去分词)
完成(finish的过去式和过去分词)
说(say的过去式和过去分词)
